text: Michael Phillip Anderson (December 25, 1959 â€“ February 1, 2003) was a United States Air Force officer and NASA astronaut. Anderson and his six fellow crew members were killed in the Space Shuttle Columbia disaster when the craft disintegrated during its re-entry into the Earth's atmosphere. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2003 deaths Category:American astronauts Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:Aviation deaths in the United States
